snippet.title: Deceit: The 6-Player Game of Trust & Deception
snippet.description:
Deceit tests your instincts at trust and deception in a multiplayer first-person shooter. You wake up in an asylum to the sound of an unfamiliar voice, surrounded by five others. A third of your group have been infected with a virus, but who escape?

Get the indie horror game Deceit free on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/466240/Deceit/
